input.sentences: i took my daughter to watch a race today .
lots of people were dressed up because halloween was coming up soon .
a person dressed like spongebob squarepants made my daughter laugh really hard .
a couple of people thought it would be funny to dress as a camel .
both of them had a heat stroke and i saw the camel fall over .
output.sentences: There were lots of people for the halloween race.
One person dressed up as spongebob squarepants.
The heat stroke caused the fall.
